column5: anyone considering going out on the boq with hawghunter....I really highly recommend him, he kept us on fish when the rest of the bay was skunked, he really knows the bay, and one of the nicest guys you'll ever meet

I met Hawg Hunter and the boys @ Carra's on Christmas eve. Good bunch of guys. lotsa info. Even said he would find a way to get my crippled brother out. ( broken leg just before christmas screwed his ice season) I would reccomend him although I've not been out with him. You can't beat the experience of a local guide to put you on the fish.
go, you won't regret it....and the Guy at Cara's knew what he was doing when he signed him on
When were you out with Hawg? Recently?
